title: 15 year relationship with Rajapaksas ends today: Jeevan Thondaman
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Leader of the Ceylon Worker’s Congress, Jeevan Thondaman says that the 15 year relationship with the Rajapaksa’s ends today.
He stated this at the CWC’s May Day rally, which was held at the party headquarters in Hatton.
Tamil Nadu President of the Bharatha Janatha Party, Annamalai joined as the Chief Guest of the event.
